html:
1.19.24  1:30 am   Am I getting older

      no way

1.19.24  12:12 am   What do you think would have been the first English word that a caveman uttered before complex language even existed? (Like he uttered it by mistake but wanted to convey something.)

      'utter'

1.18.24  11:51 pm   have you ever felt weightless?

      almost

1.18.24  11:37 pm   could i be a princess?

      yes

1.18.24  10:40 pm   why do i feel so bad

      you are getting ready to feel good later

1.18.24  10:37 pm   What was the question Damien skipped in "Maybe I could eat blades of grass"?

      this one

1.18.24  10:05 pm   Opinions on beanbag chairs?

      seems like a risky asset

1.18.24  9:56 pm   i've noticed many of my favorite musicians are multi-instrumentalists who started on drums or whose best instrument is drums, you included. my main instruments are voice, piano, and guitar in that order, but i would really like to have that drum-based foundation/way of thinking about music & songs. however, i don't have access to a proper drumset right now. do you think a practice pad/pillow would be good enough to learn these concepts?

     to learn drums, in music, there actually might be something more important than owning a drumset and it's this: playing in a band for a live audience, where you are the drummer and thus are largely responsible for directing and guiding the rhythmic cohesion of the whole group, and hence the whole room. this is the part of drumming that i think will strenghten you in the way that you are looking for

     any advice on how to incorporate "drum thinking" into songwriting?

     it's not something you can think about it. it's like knowing French, natively, then you start writing songs. you're not thinking about incorporating 'french thinking' into the songs, you're just writing songs which will probably end up having french in them because you speak french

1.18.24  9:10 pm   Are you absolutely sure you arent an alien that is sneaking on earth so earth can be taken iver by venusian forces?

      yes. there's so many specifics in what you said, it's pretty easy for it not all to be true. even if part of it were true

1.18.24  8:35 pm   have you ever found anything cute?

     i believe so

      is that a descriptor you have ever been moved to use?

      sure. for example, false advertising with fraudulent identity impersonation is cute

1.18.24  8:03 pm   where does your humor come from

      it is directly inspired by the space time continuum

1.18.24  7:56 pm   are you a princess?

      nearly

1.18.24  7:10 pm   Why do some melodies sound better in certain tambres?

      why wouldn't they

1.18.24  3:28 pm   can you have me some bad advice please

      go ahead and give someone bad advice

1.18.24  1:05 pm   Will you be performing at the Super Bowl anytime soon

      i'm not sure

1.18.24  12:07 pm   what if christmas happened on friday 13? that would be quite scary

      i agree

1.18.24  12:07 pm   Do you hate it when the questions are incompl

      no, and i find it also important to point out to you that your question is not incomplete because the subject of your question was incompleteness and the question itself was intended as a demonstration of such but was therefore not genuinely incomplete. i've seen questions of that nature as well as actual incomplete questions and i hate neither

1.18.24  12:00 pm   Have you ever done that thing where you don't have any thoughts for about a minute, then realize that you are thinking about the fact that you didn't have any thoughts, and then want those thoughts to go away so you can stop thinking about anything again?

      no

1.18.24  11:49 am   How many questions had questions but those questions within questions had the answer inside of another question with a question inside of it?

      happens all the time

1.18.24  9:43 am   what do you use to learn languages

      large quantities of recorded audio/video of genuine conversations with people that i enjoy listening to

1.18.24  7:42 am   Why does putting 3 question marks at the end of a question make it funnier???

      i don't know. i can't think of a situation where that would be the case, but that doesn't mean such a situation does not exist

1.18.24  6:35 am   any date ideas?

      january 1,

1.18.24  5:07 am   what are your thoughts on cowboys

      sounds somehow fictitious, historical, or both

1.18.24  1:41 am   Hey, how do I feel okay when so many things are going so genuinely scary bad? How do I stay calm and not feel bad about myself? You know what I mean? 

      look for opportunities to make something good. this may sound crazy, but it might be even more fun than if things were already good

1.18.24  12:04 am   you pod cast but what if you cast the pod a lil too far?

      there's no turning back

1.17.24  11:49 pm   are you a fish

      i have no idea

1.17.24  11:03 pm   do you prefer singles or albums? and what about EPs?

      which one is songs

1.17.24  10:57 pm   Is gravity downwards or inwards? 

      that depends of course upon which way is up

1.17.24  10:27 pm   could you transcribe "snail time" for me, please?

      sure

1.17.24  10:20 pm   i've just realised that I've been spending a long time trying to play the drums but on the keys because it's what I've spent the most energy trying to get better at in the past. firstly have you had a realisation like this where you listen to your heart and it sounds like an instrument other than what you're currently spending a lot of energy on?

     yes

      secondly do you have any tips on learning drums? Ways to hit the snare confuses me  but cymbals I can get behind

     it's a cool sound when coins land on the snare drum

1.17.24  9:02 pm   why do we ask "what is the meaning of the song" instead of asking about the creation process or what the song means to the creator

      that's your choice. i've been asked both, and more

1.17.24  8:19 pm   do you think pigeons are secret spies for the government?

      no

1.17.24  8:02 pm   should I transcribe one of your pieces for viola

      sure, but it's also ok if you don't

1.17.24  7:08 pm   how do you go about learning the chords to a song? as in having them memorized, being able to play them back on a keyboard fluidly, etc.

      that doesn't make sense to me. for me it's more like memorizing syllables of words, which indeed i don't do, because the awareness sits in a deeper part of the brain that does not require any direct concentration. like a word, as long as i've heard it a time or two, i can say it comfortably, even if i don't think consciously about the individual syllables. the same is true with songs and the chords in them

1.17.24  6:49 pm   did you go to college and/or graduate

      no, but i've seen colleges depicted in films. hopefully that is sufficient

1.17.24  6:18 pm   In your opinion, what is the correct plural of the word octopus? and if you answer 'octopuses' know that you're wrong

      what a fun game this has been so far

1.17.24  4:48 pm   which way is up?

      sometimes down, actually

1.17.24  4:17 pm   what is your opinion on egg sandwicbnes

      i have yet to admit that they exist

1.17.24  2:01 pm   Heya Bill. I'm a big fan of your work. What are your thoughts on bread? I love bread. It's the best thing since sliced bread.

      bread is famous for being good. only time will tell if it lives up to its reputation

1.17.24  1:59 pm   Define "baked potato"

      that is a measure of normalcy

1.17.24  1:27 pm   Why do we value people for things they can't control? (such as intelligence, beauty, or soundness of mind)

      not everything can be controlled. and not everything is valued. there is not a direct relationship between what is valued and what is controlled, so, admittedly, sometimes they do not overlap (as you mentioned). but, to be fair, sometimes they do

1.17.24  12:33 pm   If you decided you want to paint your friend's room and they told you that you can use colour of your choice which colour would you use?

      i won't be making any color decisions without seeing the room first

1.17.24  10:23 am   hey bill, have you watched past lives?

      i don't recall

1.17.24  9:54 am   HOW did chicken cross the road??

      flew over, just high enough to avoid any traffic

1.17.24  8:03 am   When someone mentions Jeopardy! Think Music, which version do you hear in your head? For me it's the one with the flugelhorn ('97-'08).

      that is by far the best version for me, but you may have already known that

1.17.24  4:31 am   Do you think the questions have helped you learn things about the world over the years 

      yes

1.17.24  3:36 am   How do you interpret your compositions into visual accompaniments?

      i don't know how, but i do it anyway

1.17.24  3:18 am   Do you ever feel like there 

      yes

1.17.24  12:10 am   I disagree with your opinion on kindness being the best superpower.

     that was not an opinion per se. it was an answer i chose for a question that didn't make very much sense to me in the first place, but now that i reflect on my choice i realize it was a chance to convey that kindness is super and super powerful

     Superhuman abilities are not required to be kind.

     that was certainly not how i interpreted the question

      That's the best part about it! Anyone can do it.

1.16.24  11:18 pm   do you get annoyed at answering the same questions over and over?

      no, i was already annoyed before
